src:
Bekuk Jepang, Praveen/Melati ke Babak Kedua Fuzhou China Terbuka 2019
07 Nov 2019, 08:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pasangan ganda campuran Indonesia, Praveen Jordan/Melati Daeva Oktavianti sukses menang dua gim atas wakil Jepang, Takuro Hoki/Wakana Nagahara di Fuzhou China Terbuka 2019 pada Rabu (5/11/2019). Hasil positif itu membuat Praveen/Melati lolos ke-16 besar.
Menjalani partai babak pertama di Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Rabu (6/11/2019) siang waktu setempat, Praveen/Melati tampil gemilang. Terus mendominasi, pasangan unggulan ketujuh itu menang 21-17 atas Hoki/Nagahara pada gim pertama.
"Seperti kita tahu, pemain Jepang itu ulet dan tidak mudah dimatikan. Waktu unggul di poin 10, kami banyak melakukan kesalahan sendiri, dan poinnya tersusul," ujar Praveen dalam rilis dari PBSI.
text:
Defeat Japan, Praveen / Jasmine to the Second Round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019
Nov 7 2019, 08:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian mixed doubles pair Praveen Jordan / Melati Daeva Oktavianti successfully won two games over Japan's representative, Takuro Hoki / Wakana Nagahara at the 2019 China Open Fuzhou on Wednesday (11/05/2019). The positive results made Praveen / Melati qualify for the 16th place.
Undergoing the first round party at Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Wednesday (11/06/2019) afternoon local time, Praveen / Melati performed brilliantly. Continuing to dominate, the seventh seeded pair won 21-17 over Hoki / Nagahara in the first game.
"As we know, Japanese players are tenacious and not easily killed. When winning at 10 points, we made a lot of mistakes ourselves, and the points were overtaken," Praveen said in a release from PBSI.
